mapper.insert: insert into `tiktok-mall`.orders(number, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, pay_time, pay_method, amount, is_paid, username, email, address_detail) values (#{number}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId}, #{orderTime}, #{payTime}, #{payMethod}, #{amount}, #{isPaid}, #{username}, #{email}, #{addressDetail})
mapper.select: select o.*, od.product_id, od.name, od.picture, od.quantity, od.amount as price from `tiktok-mall`.orders o left join `tiktok-mall`.order_detail od on o.id = od.order_id where user_id = #{userId} order by o.order_time desc
